title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond the Hype: Delivering Measurable ROI with Generative AI on AWS (AIM231)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越炒作：在AWS上通过生成式AI实现可衡量的投资回报率 (AIM231)
abstract: With 96% of organizations increasing AI investments but only 36% successfully deploying to production, where's the disconnect? Dr. Ryan Ries, Chief AI and Data Scientist at Mission will showcase the GenAI implementations that are delivering real ROI in 2025. Learn which specific use cases are yielding the greatest returns across different industries and how to identify similar high-value opportunities within your own organization. Leave with actionable strategies to move your AWS GenAI initiatives from experimental to measurable value, based on proven approaches that have reduced costs, improved efficiency, and enhanced customer experiences. This presentation is brought to you by CDW, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 96%的组织增加了AI投资，但只有36%成功部署到生产环境，问题出在哪里？Mission首席AI和数据科学家Ryan Ries博士将展示在2025年真正带来投资回报率的GenAI实施案例。了解哪些具体用例在不同行业中产生最大回报，以及如何在您自己的组织中识别类似的高价值机会。基于已证实能够降低成本、提高效率和增强客户体验的方法，带走可行的策略，将您的AWS GenAI计划从实验阶段推进到可衡量的价值阶段。本演示由AWS合作伙伴CDW提供。
